GeneralSettings.Title: General settings
GeneralSettings.BotExpertsDescription: Specified roles and users will be able to view and modify bot settings, beware. Roles with administrator permissions have access to the dashboard by default.
GeneralSettings.RestoringDescription: Restore roles and/or nicknames to a member who has joined back to the server
GeneralSettings.RestoreStrictRolesDescription: These roles will not be restored when user re-joins a guild

Moderation.RespectHierarchy: Respect roles hierarchy in moderation commands
Moderation.DenyModerateUsersWithModeratorPermission: Prohibit moderating users with moderator permissions
Moderation.UnmoderatedRolesDescription: Moderation commands cannot be applied to these roles
Moderation.CaseLogChannelDescription: Moderator actions will be logged in the specified channel
Moderation.AutoModDeprecated: The auto-moderation feature is deprecated and we recommend using Discord AutoMod.
Moderation.PenaltiesDescription: Penalties for reaching a certain number of warnings

CustomBehavior.AboutCustomPlugins: Create your own plugins and share them with the community. This feature opens up unique perspectives for users to customize and optimize the bot for their individual needs.

Activities.LevelsResetOnLeave: Reset the level when member leaves
Activities.LevelsAwardsDescription: Adding awards for achieving certain levels
Activities.EconomyResetOnLeave: Reset the wallet when member leaves

VoiceChannels.VoiceRolesDescription: Automatic addition of roles when connecting to voice channel
VoiceChannels.AutoVoicesDescription: Automatic creation and deletion of voice channels

Useful.ReportsNotifyAboutUnwantedUsers: Notify potentially unwanted users when they join
Useful.ImageRotationNote: The image will be updated {relativeTime} when the following events are triggered:
Useful.AutoReactionsDescription: Automatically add reactions to the message
Useful.AutoThreadsDescription: Automatic creation of threads under messages
Useful.InteractiveReactionsDescription: Adding roles and channel accesses by clicking on reactions

LandingPage.Title: Create (everything) you want
LandingPage.Description: Feature-rich Discord bot designed to enhance your community management and moderation experience.
LandingPage.FeatureCustomBehaviorDescription: Configure the bot's behavior w/ JavaScript. Create custom commands and automation tasks to bring magic to your community.
LandingPage.FeatureActivitiesDescription: Levels and Economy. Compete with other users in the race for a top spot on the leaderboard and get rewarded for it!
LandingPage.FeatureModerationDescription: Simple and easy to use commands, action logs, auto-moderation, potential offender alerts, user reporting, and more. Don't leave your community vulnerable.
LandingPage.FeatureSubscriptionsDescription: Link your Telegram, Twitch, and YouTube channels so subscribers will know when new content is released.
LandingPage.FeatureMusicDescription: Listen to your favorite music in voice channels. We support Spotify, Yandex.Music, SoundCloud, direct audio links and radio stations.
LandingPage.FeatureUtilityDescription: Interactive messages and reactions, temporary voice channels, welcome messages and more!
LandingPage.ReadyToGetStartedDescription: Stability. Ease. Functionality. Lacuna is a powerful tool with an intuitive interface for enhancing your community.

PatronsPage.GratitudeMessageP1: We want to express our sincere gratitude for your financial support of our bot! Your generous donation helps us further develop and improve our bot so that it can continue to provide useful services and be a useful tool for users.
PatronsPage.GratitudeMessageP2: Your kind donation makes a real difference in our work, and we appreciate your trust and support. Together we can make Lacuna even better by offering new features, improving the interface and making it more efficient.
PatronsPage.GratitudeMessageP3: We are deeply grateful for the loyal cooperation and trust you show in our project. Your support inspires us and gives us the energy to keep working. We are committed to continuing to develop and improve Lacuna so that it continues to be a valuable tool for you and other users.

EconomyCurrency.IncomePerMessageRlDescription: The user will be able to get coins again after this time
EconomyCurrency.IncomePerMinute: Money per minute in the voice channel

EconomyStoreItem.ItemPurchasePriceDescription: Set to 0 to make the item free
EconomyStoreItem.ItemProductsDescription: Roles or channels that will be issued upon purchase

AutoMod.AntiCapsPercentage: Percentage of CAPS in the message
AutoMod.NewbiesModerationMinimumAccountAgeDescri: User account must be registered within the specified time
AutoMod.NicknamesModerationSelectWhatRemove: Select what to remove from nicknames
AutoMod.NicknamesModerationContainsDescription: Remove values from nicknames that are contained in this list
AutoMod.UsersSlowdownMessagesLimitDescription: How many messages a user can send in 5 seconds
AutoMod.IgnoredPermissionsDescription: Members with the selected permissions will be ignored

CustomCommand.ModifyRolesUserIdDescription: Add/remove roles to a specified user (default author of the command)
CustomCommand.ModifyWalletUserIdDescription: Change wallet of the specified user (default author of the command)
CustomCommand.ModifyWalletCurrencyIdDescription: Specify if you want to add a different currency than the standard one

LacunaDiamond.HasSubscription: This community already has Lacuna Diamond until {date}
LacunaDiamond.UnlimitedSubscription: The server has time-unlimited Lacuna Diamond
LacunaDiamond.BonusMusicDescription: Unlimited tracks in queue, playlist listening, audio streaming and volume changing.
LacunaDiamond.BonusIncreasedLimitsDescription: More level rewards, store items, subscriptions, automations, interactive messages, voice roles, temporary voice channels, and more.
LacunaDiamond.BonusCustomBehaviorWithCodeDescription: Ability to execute JavaScript code in custom commands and automation tasks.
LacunaDiamond.BonusActivitiesDescription: Ability to earn currencies in voice channels.
LacunaDiamond.BonusRespectDescription: Material aid for project team and a special role on the official support server.
LacunaDiamond.PatreonAfterCheckout: Once you have paid for your subscription, you will need to check it to activate Lacuna Diamond.
LacunaDiamond.PatreonAfterCheckoutImportantInfo: To access Lacuna Diamond, you need to connect your Discord to {platform} and stay on our support server.
LacunaDiamond.DNBBonusesInfo: Once you have boosted our support server, click the check button below to activate Lacuna Diamond. (will be available as long as you are a booster of the support server). You can only activate Lacuna Diamond for one server.
LacunaDiamond.TokensInfo: You can vote for our bot and receive tokens that can be converted into Diamond subscription time (1 token = {bonusesDurationInHours}).
LacunaDiamond.TransferringDescription: You must be the owner of both communities to transfer Lacuna Diamond. The current community must not have Lacuna Diamond.

PlanComparisonFeatures.AutomationSequentialExecutionsWithOneTri: Number of sequential executions of automations with one type of trigger
PlanComparisonFeatures.ActionLogEventsProcessedPerMinuteNumber: Number of action log events processed per minute
PlanComparisonFeatures.PlaybackQueueTrackNumber: Number of tracks in the queue
PlanComparisonFeatures.VoiceExpMembersNumber: Number of members in voice channels at the same time, who will receive experience for voice activity
PlanComparisonFeatures.ActivityMultipliersNumber: Number of experience and earning multipliers
PlanComparisonFeatures.ImageEditorElementsNumber: Number of elements in the image editor

Subscriptions.TelegramHelpNote: To link Telegram and Discord, add the bot {botLink} to the desired channel and then enter its name or identifier in the field below.
Subscriptions.TelegramChannelNameDescription: Unique identifier or username of the target channel (in the format {'@'}channelusername)

UserSurvey.ItWouldHelpUs: It would help us if you could take 10 seconds of your time to rate your experience with us.
UserSurvey.HowSatisfied: How satisfied are you with the bot?
UserSurvey.HowManyMembers: How many members are on your server?
UserSurvey.TellUsMore: Tell us more about your experience
UserSurvey.SurveySubmitted: Thanks! You help us become better.

AutoReaction.MessageTypesDescription: Leave the field empty if you want to add reactions to all types of messages
AutoReaction.TextMatchesDescription: Will react only if the message contains the specified parameters
AutoReaction.ExcludedTextMatchesDescription: Will not react if the message contains the specified parameters

InteractiveReaction.SingleElementDescription: Allows you to make the reaction element unique
InteractiveReaction.MessageIdDescription: You can get it by right-clicking on the message and select "Copy ID" when developer mode is on. The message must be in the selected channel above
InteractiveReaction.ReferencesDescription: Roles or channels that will be linked to the selected reaction

AutoVoice.VoiceChannelDescription: The selected voice channel will be used as a trigger
AutoVoice.DefaultPositionDescription: Position of the temporary voice channel relative to other channels in the category
AutoVoice.OwnerPermissionsDescription: The owner of the temporary voice channel will be given the selected permissions
AutoVoice.ModeratorRolesDescription: Selected roles will get the same permissions as the owner of the temporary channel, but their permissions in that channel cannot be changed. The bot needs the administrator permission to work correctly

VoiceRole.BoundChannelsDescription: Leave the field empty if you want the role to be issued when connecting to any channel

Logs.GuildUpdatedAFKTimeout: timeout of inactivity in voice channels
Logs.VoiceMoveTemplate: {username} moves from the voice channel {from} to {to}
